trans-unit.source: Provides methods that a derived task handler class can implement in order to process an asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder metoder som en oppgave som behandlingsprogrammet klasse kan implementere for å behandle en asynkron oppgave.

trans-unit.source: TheHttpTaskAsyncHandler class provides a simplified way to handle asynchronous tasks without having to implement the <xref:System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler.BeginProcessRequest%2A> and <xref:System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler.EndProcessRequest%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: TheHttpTaskAsyncHandler klassen tilbyr en forenklet måte å håndtere asynkrone oppgaver uten å måtte implementere den <xref:System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler.BeginProcessRequest%2A>og <xref:System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler.EndProcessRequest%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler.EndProcessRequest%2A> </xref:System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler.BeginProcessRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a handler for an asynchronous task, you can override the <xref:System.Web.HttpTaskAsyncHandler.ProcessRequestAsync%2A> method and implement custom task handling code.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre Hvis du vil opprette et behandlingsprogram for en oppgave for asynkrone, den <xref:System.Web.HttpTaskAsyncHandler.ProcessRequestAsync%2A>metoden og Implementer egendefinert oppgave behandler kode.</xref:System.Web.HttpTaskAsyncHandler.ProcessRequestAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the <xref href="System.Web.HttpTaskAsyncHandler"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Kalles fra konstruktører i avledede klasser initialisere den <xref href="System.Web.HttpTaskAsyncHandler"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the task handler class instance can be reused for another asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om oppgaven behandlingsprogrammet klasseforekomsten kan brukes for en annen asynkron aktivitet når overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the handler can be reused; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis et behandlingsprogram kan brukes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides code that handles a synchronous task.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, gir du kode som behandler en oppgave for synkron.

trans-unit.source: The HTTP context.
trans-unit.target: HTTP-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: The method is implemented but does not provide any default handling for synchronous tasks.
trans-unit.target: Metoden implementeres, men inneholder ikke en standard behandler for synkron oppgaver.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides code that handles an asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, gir du kode som behandler en asynkron oppgave.

trans-unit.source: To create a custom handler for an asynchronous task, override the ProcessRequestAsync method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en egendefinert behandlingsprogram for en oppgave for asynkrone overstyre ProcessRequestAsync-metoden.

trans-unit.source: The HTTP context.
trans-unit.target: HTTP-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: Aktiviteten asynkrone.

trans-unit.source: Initiates asynchronous processing of a task in an HTTP task handler.
trans-unit.target: Starter asynkron behandling av en oppgave i HTTP oppgaven behandlingsprogram.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.HttpTaskAsyncHandler> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.HttpTaskAsyncHandler>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler> </xref:System.Web.HttpTaskAsyncHandler>

trans-unit.source: The HTTP context.
trans-unit.target: HTTP-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: The callback method to invoke when the method returns.
trans-unit.target: Metoden tilbakeringing for å aktivere låse metoden.

trans-unit.source: Additional data for processing the task.
trans-unit.target: Ytterligere data om oppgaven.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains status data about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder statusdata om den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Ends asynchronous processing of a task in an HTTP task handler.
trans-unit.target: Endene Asynkron behandling av en oppgave i HTTP oppgaven behandlingsprogram.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.HttpTaskAsyncHandler> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.HttpTaskAsyncHandler>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler> </xref:System.Web.HttpTaskAsyncHandler>

trans-unit.source: The status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Statusen for den asynkrone operasjonen.
